def.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.value: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 12 months

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 12 months-42

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis A.Inactivated HAV 2 doses: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis A.Inactivated HAV 1 dose: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule

a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis A.Inactivated HAV 2 doses: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
